Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2012 04:18PM BeanCounter42 wrote: Hi Frapp,  I hope you have a wonderful birthday! I'm  taking Femara and getting CT and bone scans every 12 weeks at Duke. I had my ovaries removed since I'm estrogen receptor positive, so now I'm dealing with hot flashes, chills, and stiffness. I would love to hear how others deal with these symptoms, especially natural remedies because I don't like to take medications unless I have to. I would love to hear how your treatment has been over the last two years. God bless, Kim
Posts.Title: Connect-Charlotte, NC BeanCounter42 Jejik
